column4: and how do I search in packages via command-line via apt-get? must i install aptitude?

gedit does have a file browser plugin (I believe it is shipped with it, but it's disabled by default).. there are quite a few plugins for gedit. gedit actually has the potential to be a really decent IDE.
ah ok, I find gvim to have a bit much command-line though. NERD-tree etc. only more and more keys.
